title: Harrington Font doppleganger? Please help
content: Can you show us a sample of what you're looking for?
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: Have you seen this 'Harrington clone' anywhere else? It looks to me like someone just squooshed Harrington using WordArt and then chopped off the C flourish.
I was trying to say the same thing but my post ended up in cyberspace. I think that condensing the Harrington would also turn those sharp curves into dollops.
